body: He was pretending to pig eat tiger?

I am a Chinese, and my experience with the comic hero seems to be that when I was a child, there was a super idol cousin in Foshan. He was very good at the beginning. He had 1.7 meters in primary school, and he was also a master at playing games. Later, he did not know why he became a terrible fool. Every day in junior high school, he forced me to play basketball and stay up late to play on the mobile phone. Without accompanying him, he would beat me. Fists and bottles. I woke up two years after he tortured me. I went to the police and fought with him afterwards. Now I am back to my normal life, but my memory always tortures me. Every time I see basketball, I think I was thrown by the ball because I didn't get the ball. Every time I see the boxer, I think he forced me to practice with him until the next day.
所以弟弟也跟著死了嗎？
I don't understand nothing but i like this
这个故事情节感觉好眼熟，想不起来是什么动漫里的了
